name: places/ChIJO9N9QKhZwokR_l3jVabnDsw
formattedAddress: 173 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 173 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: To say that Mixology Post is THE place for all your sound needs would be an understatement. Rob Kahn, the Owner and Executive Creative Director is as modest and down-to-earth as he is exceptionally talented and professional. In numerous collaborations over the years, Rob and his team have always surpassed expectations. They deliver on time, on budget, and on brief. They do everything from original music composition, sound design, sound editing, branding, commercial, experiential, narrative work... they do it all. And do it with utmost passion, care, and precision! They're really easy to work with and always bring fresh ideas to a project, big or small. Mixology's client list is a veritable who's who of industry leaders and media brands: HBO, NBCUniversal, National Geographic, Sundance, Nike, and ESPN to name just a few. But don't let their prestige discourage you: Rob is super nice and he's always willing to work with your budget. Rob and Mixology Post are my first and last resort for our sound work. Phenomenal.
